data.text: @PokerPolitics Pandumbic...idiots are why we are here at, "CDC Shrugs"

@PokerPolitics Now, by the way, Science is back to saying it was the Wuhan market after all. 

James Comey got nothing on Science.
@PokerPolitics If Putin would declare war on stupid people, I’d totally get behind that. 🤷‍♂️

@TensionFilter @PokerPolitics Everyone knows the most effective way to engineer a biological attack is to infect millions of your own citizens and allied nations, wait for the disease to slowly, slowly make its way to the target nation, and then count on them to completely fuck up pandemic management.

@PokerPolitics The old "lab leak" conspiracy imagined a natural virus escaping accidentally; this then morphed into the idea of an engineered virus supposedly released intentionally. That this contradicts the original conspiracy is not only never addressed, nobody seems even to notice.

@PokerPolitics The problem with creating a gimmick account that makes one hyper-specific issue your entire identity is when the rest of the world moves on and talks about literally anything else, you're now trapped trying to force every conversation to be about your thing and no one cares.
@PokerPolitics The whole world was wearing masks in solidarity with us.
@PokerPolitics Reality and facts are abhorrent to them.
